Note: Formerly listed by first line of first quatrain as 2262.3; for similar content, see 6299.
Subjects: The Five Dogs of London; historical poems; evils of the times; Richard III, as duke of York, attack on; dogs
_description: The Five Dogs of London — five quatrains each with a proverbial couplet heading, and concluding couplet
